biotools.summary: Web tool to efficiently analyse multiple genome sequence samples for the presence of STR loci using Tandem Repeats Finder (TRF) and generates identical, polymorphic, and different STR loci for each comparison between two samples.

bioschemas.name: pSTR Finder
bioschemas.summary: Web tool to efficiently analyse multiple genome sequence samples for the presence of STR loci using Tandem Repeats Finder (TRF) and generates identical, polymorphic, and different STR loci for each comparison between two samples.
